answers.answer: I was 16 weeks and ended up having gestational diabetes. I good you don't get it. It's not that bad just watch what you eat and check your sugar. It's scary I know but its very managble with diet and excersise.  But most women pass the 3 hr test.
I had the same thing happen to me but mine was slighty high so i have to go do the 3 hour test next week

question: i just got a phone call to say i need to have a second test for diabeties because my first test come back really high. If this test comes back high then i have gestational diabeties. Has anyone else had to do a second test because the first come back high. am 26+5 and am a bit scared what the results will be
title: diabeties
